start_by_creating_inventory: Get started by creating your first inventory.
crop_image_description: Select the area to be used as the product image.
edit_product_description: Update the product's basic information, prices, and image here.
delete_product_confirmation: This action cannot be undone. This product will be permanently deleted from this inventory.
empty_order_list_description: Please enter an order quantity for at least one product to share.
order_list_share_error: There was a problem sharing the list.
share_not_supported_clipboard: Your browser does not support sharing. The order list has been copied to the clipboard.
clipboard_copy_error: The list could not be copied to the clipboard.
create_order_list_description: Prepare your order list to send to your suppliers. Only products with a specified quantity will be added to the list.
new_inventory_description: Choose a name and icon for your new inventory, then specify the locations where you want to keep stock.
locations_description: Places where you will track product stocks (max {{count}}).
edit_inventory_description: Update your inventory's name, icon, and stock locations.
delete_inventory_warning: Deleting this inventory is irreversible. All products and stock data belonging to this inventory will be permanently deleted.
confirm_delete_location_title: Are you sure you want to delete this location?
confirm_delete_location_description: Deleting this location will permanently delete all stock data associated with it. This action cannot be undone.
confirm_delete_inventory_title: Are you sure you want to delete the inventory?
confirm_delete_inventory_description: This action cannot be undone. The '{{name}}' inventory and all products and stock data within it will be permanently deleted.
inventory_name_min_char: Inventory name must be at least {{count}} characters.
at_least_one_location_message: You must add at least one location.
max_locations_message: You can add a maximum of {{count}} locations.
product_name_min_char: Product name must be at least {{count}} characters.
product_code_min_char: Product code must be at least {{count}} characters.
purchase_price_min_value: Purchase price must be 0 or greater.
sale_price_min_value: Sale price must be 0 or greater.
critical_threshold_min_value: Critical threshold must be 0 or greater.
select_product_image_message: Please upload an image or select an icon.
image_crop_failed_description: An error occurred while cropping the image. Please try again.
product_added_message: '{{name}}' product has been added to the inventory.
product_deleted_description: '{{name}}' has been permanently deleted from the inventory.
product_update_error: An error occurred while updating the product.
settings_description: Manage language and currency preferences for the application.
